title: Looking for contemporary, condensed font
content:
I'm looking for a contemporary font (probably sans serif) that is modern, distinctive and fairly condensed. Sensational Sans is close to what I'm looking for, but it's a little too condensed. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sensational_sans_2_5919.jpg)
author: JamesM

comments.content:
Tasse  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/tasse\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/tasse_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/tasse\_ot/")

Deja Vu Sans Condensed  
 [http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main\_Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page "http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main\_Page")

Encode Sans  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/115320](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/www.typophile.com/node/115320 "http://www.typophile.com/node/115320")

Klavika Condensed  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process\_type\_foundry/klavika\_con...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process_type_foundry/klavika_condensed_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process\_type\_foundry/klavika\_condensed\_ot/")

In the same vein, Ubuntu Condensed:  
 [http://font.ubuntu.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/font.ubuntu.com/ "http://font.ubuntu.com/")

Would be [http://next.fontshop.com/families/ff-kava](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417175120/http:/next.fontshop.com/families/ff-kava "http://next.fontshop.com/families/ff-kava") too expressive?
